refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Write totally ordered list consistent with the partial ordering in FILE. With no FILE, or when FILE is -, read standard input.

listitem.para: GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report tsort translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for tsort is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and tsort programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
